entry.title: CVEs assigned for lightning projects: please upgrade!
entry.summary: Recently, various security issues have been discovered in different lightning projects which may lead to the loss of funds. The details about these issues will be revealed within four weeks from now, which is on September 27, 2019. Therefore, it is highly recommended that all users upgrade their systems before this date to ensure security measures are in place.One of the affected releases is CVE-2019-12998 c-lightning. It is essential for users to take immediate action and upgrade their system as soon as possible to avoid any potential loss of funds. This announcement serves as a cautionary message to all users to remain vigilant and take necessary precautions to protect their assets. In conclusion, it is advised that users take proactive measures to ensure their security, such as upgrading their systems regularly, keeping their software up to date, and staying informed about any security concerns or updates. By taking these actions, users can help prevent loss of funds and maintain the integrity of their financial transactions.
